manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Premium Butterfly Double Edge Safety Razor Kit Experience the art of shaving like never before with our Premium Butterfly Double Edge Safety Razor. Engineered for efficiency and comfort, this razor delivers a close and clean shave, leaving your skin smooth and irritation-free.

Our Legend 2.0 model provides a safe and efficient twisting mechanism compared to other models. By simply twisting the bottom of the razor, the blade cavity opens in a butterfly style to allow the safety of removing and inserting blades into your razor. The long handle design offers exceptional control, allowing you to navigate every contour of your face and neck effortlessly. Crafted in a striking gun metal black finish, our razor exudes sophistication and style, making it a perfect gift for any discerning gentleman. Our complete kit includes a travel case for convenient storage and travel, ensuring your razor stays protected wherever you go. Plus, we provide five razor blades, giving you extended usage and saving you money in the long run.

Outstanding Experience The Co Premium Butterfly Double Edge Safety Razor Kit is a game-changer for those seeking a premium shaving experience. With its precision-engineered design and high-quality materials, this razor ensures a smooth and close shave every time. Its butterfly opening mechanism makes blade replacement a breeze, making it not only efficient but also cost-effective for long-term use. Elevate your grooming routine and achieve the perfect shave with the Co Premium Butterfly Double Edge Safety Razor Kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp and Durable
reviews.reviewText: The case it comes with is awesome great for work trips or vacation, the handle is comfortable for no slip action and the blade placement is sharp!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap product, but also a cheap price. An OK introductory double edge razor.
reviews.reviewText: I have used double edged razors for over a decade now, and have used everything from Feather DEs at 10 times the price of this to even cheaper razors, and all across the range. Generally, they fall into 3 camps: [1] cheap introductory ones in the sub 25 buck range, [2] decent work horses that range from 25 to 75 (think Merkur, and the like), and [3] the premium brands like Feather and Rockwell at 75 and up. It's unfair for me to stack this razor up against a Rockwell because it's not. And it's not at that price point either.On first impression, the razor makes noise when you jiggle it, it lacks any heft, and the coating on it feels artificial. The house brand blades are unmarked and I threw them away immediately because I wanted to test the razor itself, and wanted to give it good Japanese made blades to give it a fighting chance.Despite the initial jiggle, the blade did screw on tight (I had to force it down) and it did work. The blade is aggressive (meaning a large gap around the blade), but most DE razors in the introductory price point are. As such, it's not as forgiving as other razors.All in all, it's a decent razor for the price point. If you are currently shelling out tons per blade refill, and would like to dip your toe into the world of Double Edge shaving, there are worse razors. This isn't your forever razor, bit it is a perfectly adequate tester to see if this style of shaving is for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and product
reviews.reviewText: I am shopping for stocking stuffers for all the important men in my family. I ran into this store on Amazon The Men’s Authority Co. and found all these great item to gift in the holidays. They are made of very good quality and make a very nice gift set. I highly recommend for any special men you need to find gifts for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Difficult shaving angle
reviews.reviewText: While this razor is all right, I would not recommend it to someone new to shaving with a safety razor. The blade angle is very aggressive and it is easy for an experienced person to cut themselves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Functional, cost-effective razor
reviews.reviewText: I typically have always shaved with an electric razor. The only manual razor I have used, if my memory serves me correctly, it a Gillette Mach 5.My first impression when I unboxed this razor was that the blades seemed very thin/flimsy. I guess I just expected them to be thicker. However, the razor did its job effectively despite my initial concerns. This is definitely a very cost-effective way to shave. The razor is well-balanced and feels good in my hand. It was easy to get the hang of using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Close Shave – Love the Butterfly Opening
reviews.reviewText: This safety razor brings back memories from my childhood watching my dad shave. I think he actually taught me how to shave using a safety razor, but I haven’t used one in decades. I was excited to give this a try, as I have absolutely no luck with electric shavers. I’ve used lots of different bladed systems, but I’m always on the lookout for something better. One thing I really like about this razor is the nicely textured grip handle. It makes it so easy to hold and control, and believe me, I want to make sure I’m in control when I use a double edged safety razor! Another feature of this razor that is just fantastic is the butterfly opening that makes inserting the blade so easy.As far as performance goes, I think it did a nice job giving me a pretty close shave. I usually use a warm wash cloth and put it on my face to loosen up my skin. Then, I apply some shaving cream that I like, and finally start in with the actual shaving. For my first time using this it went pretty smoothly, but I think I need to get it in my head that this isn’t quite like shaving with traditional disposable blade systems. I think it’s just going to take some time to get into a different habit when using this. Also, I'm not sure the actual blades are the greatest quality. Overall, though, it did a decent job, and it is kind of fun to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Clean
reviews.reviewText: It has a super sleek design. It is super easy to change out blades and clean. The blades aren't the best. This is super easy to hold and use. Travel case is a plus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and sexy and well balanced with butterfly opening
reviews.reviewText: This double edged safety razer is well balanced and built -- love the slick black, but mine came with some rust inside the opening, so questionable as to how well it will hold up over time.Butterfly opening is easy to twist open and close to lock the blade in place -- allows for easy blade changeout and cleaning. Included blades aren't the best, but the handle works great and is easy to hold and maneuver.Love the travel case that came with this with enough space to hold extra blades and a small mirror.
